channel.title: Troubleshooting :: CID guide website
channel.description: The two most common things to go wrong are a USB Control Box Problem or True Zero getting reset wrong. USB Control Box Problems A USB control box problem happens when there is a yellow box on the computer that says there’s a “USB control box problem!”. When there is a USB control box problem, it usually means there has been a problem with the power. Reset the power box, and then press “retry control box” on the computer.
